title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS libraries to pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and 30+ other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; sync & async APIs for chat, generate, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web interface for Ollama (ChatGPT-style UI), supports multi-model chats, uploads, RAG.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Enhanced Node CLI for Ollama with prompts library, conversation history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copplet code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for document Q&A.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers sync/async methods, streaming, model management.

title: ollama-chat-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server.

title: ollama-hass-addon
summary: Home Assistant add-on to run Ollama server on edge devices (RPi, x86).

title: ollama-nim
summary: Pure Nim client library for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and async streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing ergonomic async wrappers over Ollama REST endpoints.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/node-selector support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Chroma, QDrant, Redis.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Terminal GPT UI written in Go that proxies to Ollama with conversation saving.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-driven registry of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs for Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Python Slack bot using Socket-Mode to serve Ollama completions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset letting you use Ollama models as generators & embedders.
